column4: Hey.  is this the right place to talk about how to customise ubuntu's look?
I tried lxde and unity, still don't like the look and feel (obviously tried gnome first)
this is the right place to ask questions.  if you want to talk, try ubuntu-offtopic
kde, enlightenment if you're looking for eye candy.  super + m in compiz if you're looking for ideas on colors.  fluxbox if you're looking for light weight.
